$x/scene}</scenesShotToday> <scenesScheduledNotShot> </scenesScheduledNotShot> <scenesAdded> </scenesAdded> <scenesDeleted> </scenesDeleted> </scenesShotInfo> <shootingDaysSchedule> <travelTime>{data($x/travel)}</travelTime> <wrap>{data($x/timeWrap)}</wrap> <lunchBreak>{data($x/mealBreak)}</lunchBreak> <totalHours>10:00:00</totalHours> <extrasNOs>0</extrasNOs> <HRs>00:00:00</HRs> <generalRemarks_Notes>{/DPR_Production_Process/timeSheetInfo/generalComments/text()}</generalRemarks_Notes></DPRinfo>
